snippet: Mr. Sanders’s first ad in New York features Erica Garner, the daughter of Eric Garner, the Staten Island man who died during an arrest after police officers placed him in a chokehold.
abstract: Revised ad from Bernie Sanders campaign airs in New York ahead of upcoming primary and features endorsement from Erica Garner, whose father Eric Garner died during police arrest in Staten Island, is part of effort to successfully align his campaign with Black Lives Matter movement; other advertisements in presidential race examined.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sanders’s first ad in New York features Erica Garner, the daughter of Eric Garner, the Staten Island man who died during an arrest after police officers placed him in a chokehold.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Campaign Hopes an Endorsement Resonates in New York
headline.print_headline: Citing Police Killing in Appeal to Blacks
